text: Fleurette Campeau (born 10 January 1941) is a Canadian fencer. She competed in the women's team foil event at the 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian female fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Canada Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Montreal Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in fencing Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for Canada Category:French Quebecers Category:Fencers at the 1970 British Commonwealth Games
title: Fleurette Campeau
